trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of a piece of paper.

This class is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to get the paper sizes that are available on the printer and to set the paper size for a page, respectively.
You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor to specify a custom paper size.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Height%2A> property values can be set only for custom PaperSize objects.
For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"></xref> class.
A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> created with this constructor always has its <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind>.

The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Height%2A> property values can be set only for custom <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> objects.
The name of the paper.
The width of the paper, in hundredths of an inch.
The height of the paper, in hundredths of an inch.
Gets or sets the height of the paper, in hundredths of an inch.
This height measurement is for the portrait orientation of the paper.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Width%2A> and Height property values can be set only for custom <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> objects.
The height of the paper, in hundredths of an inch.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind*> property is not set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind"></xref>.
Gets the type of paper.
You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor to specify a custom paper size.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind"></xref> values.
The Kind property is not set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the type of paper.
You can set the paper name only if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind>.
The name of the type of paper.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind*> property is not set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind"></xref>.
Gets or sets an integer representing one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"></xref> values or a custom value.
The following table shows the integer values of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> enumeration members.
A value equal to 48 or 49 or larger than 118 indicates a custom paper size; however, the RawKind property will return the actual integer value for the size.

|118|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind>| |Greater than 118|A custom paper size|
An integer representing one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"></xref> values, or a custom value.
Provides information about the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize"></xref> in string form.
A string.
Gets or sets the width of the paper, in hundredths of an inch.
This width measurement is for the portrait orientation of the paper.
The Width and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Height%2A> property values can be set only for custom <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> objects.
The width of the paper, in hundredths of an inch.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind*> property is not set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind"></xref>.
